hero.title: Starter SSR boilerplate ready for your next project
hero.subtitle: This template ships with an opinionated setup using the latest Nuxt, Tailwind CSS, and Nuxt UI so you can focus on building features.

ssr.title: Server-rendered out of the box
ssr.description: SSR mode is enabled so you get SEO benefits immediately without extra configuration.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS 4
tailwind.description: The brand-new Tailwind pipeline is pre-configured via at-tailwindcss/postcss.

nuxtUi.title: Nuxt UI 4
nuxtUi.description: Leverage the latest Nuxt UI components, theming, and design tokens globally.

about.title: About Starter Basic
about.intro: Starter Basic is a lightweight Nuxt 4 boilerplate configured with Tailwind CSS 4 and Nuxt UI 4, giving you an SSR-first foundation for projects that need excellent performance and SEO.
about.details: Extend this template by adding your own modules, design system tokens, or advanced routing as needed.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Replace this page with your preferred contact form or CRM integration.
contact.alert: Need a quick start? Hook this page up to your form provider and start collecting submissions.
